**finished 6/30/23** \
this one was pretty slow, but i really liked it. tells the story of maggie and ira as they go on a road trip to go to an old friend's funeral. lots of talk about family, and how much work a marriage is, and how to love the ones we love when they make decisions we wouldn't make ourselves.
